entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -9.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -15.8°C
Wind: WSW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
